channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Sterling Partner Engagement Manager on Cloud
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Sterling Partner Engagement Manager on Cloud

item.title: CVE-2022-22416|2024-08-03T03:14:55.065Z -- ibm -- sterling%20partner%20engagement%20manager%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Sterling Partner Engagement Manager 6.1.2, 6.2, and Cloud/SasS 22.2 is vulnerable to server-side request forgery (SSRF). This may allow an authenticated attacker to send unauthorized requests from the system, potentially leading to network enumeration or facilitating other attacks. IBM X-Force ID: 223126.

item.title: CVE-2022-22359|2024-08-03T03:14:54.590Z -- ibm -- sterling%20partner%20engagement%20manager%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Sterling Partner Engagement Manager 6.1.2, 6.2, and Cloud/SasS 22.2 is vulnerable to cross-site request forgery which could allow an attacker to execute malicious and unauthorized actions transmitted from a user that the website trusts. IBM X-Force ID: 220652.

item.title: CVE-2022-22417|2024-08-03T03:14:55.131Z -- ibm -- sterling%20partner%20engagement%20manager%20on%20cloud
item.description: IBM Sterling Partner Engagement Manager 6.1.2, 6.2, and Cloud/SasS 22.2 is vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 223127.
